ygData.subject: Re: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I beleive I went to worn great staff next.  Then Great Staff  Fine Steel Ruined Totem Staff.  Also when i was in the 8 to 15 range, I likd my giant snake fang.
ygData.messageBody:
I beleive I went to worn great staff next. Then Great Staff Fine Steel
Ruined Totem Staff. Also when i was in the 8 to 15 range, I likd my giant
snake fang. It was a pretty good piercing weapon. I have also seen wizzies
with suriken but have nevr tried to use the throwing skill much.

On a different note, find someone to summong bandages for you and leant bind
wounds. Store bought bandages can be expensive but this skill will dave
your life and give you something useful to do when you have no mana and your
part y is low on health. I have used the skill while my group is fighting
to help keep a tank going. Also sevelope your sense direction and fishing
skill/ My experience has shown me begging t be downright useless so dont
waste time doiong it.

In closing, It is a big game with lot's of options and things to try. Be
creative and unique.

Bob~0
